frame.name: Location_in_time
frame.definition: <def-root>The word(s) in this frame detail a particular moment in time.</def-root>

FE.name: Relative_time
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Relative_time</fen> denotes words that locate the time with respect to an identifiable reference point.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Name</fen> denotes the name of the particular point in time.
<ex>Make sure you lock the doors at <fex name="Name">closing</fex> <t>time</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Whole</fen> describes the larger unit of which the target word describes one part.
<ex>What <t>time</t> <fex name="Whole">of day</fex> is it?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Unit
FE.definition:
<def-root>The particular point in time, as denoted by the target word.
<ex>The <fex name="Unit"><t>time</t></fex> is 10:00.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Salient_event
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Salient_event</fen> is an event that is associated with the given point in time. <ex>It is <t>time</t> <fex name="Salient_event">to go</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Measurement
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Measurement</fen> marks a specific point in time relative to a 24 hour time system. <ex>The <t>time</t> is <fex name="Measurement">8:45</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Descriptor</fen> is any characterization or description of the point in time that is not covered by a more specific FE.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: time.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a particular moment in time

lexUnit.name: date.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a particular combination of a day, month, and year, possibly connected to an event happening at that time
